lines.text:
[to the priest]
He's dying, Father. He wants you to come. You cannot refuse a man who is dying, Father. He has so much to confess.

[Looking at news clipping]
You can tell he's a priest by the collar, that's all.
Not a very good picture, but it's what we got.
They all look alike to me. I've shot him a dozen times.
I have a question, Lieutenant. When did you lose your faith?
When I found a better one.
Oh, don't be so hard on yourself. A man is entitled to a little pride.
